articles.description: Will Trubisky start? Will Foles? Tyler Bray? Kyle Sloter? Shane Falco? Uncle Rico? Deep down in your heart of hearts, you are rooting for Uncle Rico, aren’t you?
articles.content:
THE DAILY SPONGIE SPECIAL
BEARRRSSSS
Bears place Eddie Jackson on COVID-19 reserve list - 670 The Score - The Bears placed star safety Eddie Jackson on the COVID-19 reserve list, the team announced… [+7926 chars]
